scripts.deploy:sepolia: pnpm compile && hardhat --config hardhat.config.ts deploy --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:mantle:mainnet: pnpm compile && hardhat --config mantle.config.ts deploy --network mantle
scripts.deploy:mantle:wadsley: pnpm compile && hardhat --config mantle.config.ts deploy --network mantleWadsley
scripts.deploy:polygon:mainnet: pnpm compile && hardhat --config polygon.config.ts deploy --network polygon
scripts.deploy:polygon:mumbai: pnpm compile && hardhat --config polygon.config.ts deploy --network polygonMumbai
scripts.deploy:ZkSync:mainnet: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat --config zkSync.config.ts deploy --network zkSync
scripts.deploy:ZkSync:goerli: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat --config zkSync.config.ts deploy --network zkSyncGoerli
scripts.deploy:ZkSync:sepolia: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat --config zkSync.config.ts deploy --network zkSyncSepolia
scripts.upgradeERC20ChainlinkPaymaster:ZkSync:ma: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeERC20ChainlinkPaymaster.mainnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSync
scripts.upgradeAvatarBound:ZkSync:mainnet: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeAvatarBound.mainnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSync
scripts.upgradeAvatarBound:ZkSync:goerli: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeAvatarBound.testnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSyncGoerli
scripts.upgradeAvatarBound:ZkSync:sepolia: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeAvatarBound.testnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSyncSepolia
scripts.upgradeItemBound:ZkSync:mainnet: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeItemBound.mainnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSync
scripts.upgradeItemBound:ZkSync:goerli: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeItemBound.testnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSyncGoerli
scripts.upgradeItemBound:ZkSync:sepolia: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeItemBound.testnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSyncSepolia

scripts.upgradeLevelsBound:ZkSync:sepolia: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeLevelsBound.testnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSyncSepolia
scripts.mintItemsRewardBound:ZkSync:mainnet: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat --config zkSync.config.ts deploy-zksync --network zkSync --script mints/mintRewardItems.ts
scripts.mintItemsRewardBound:ZkSync:sepolia: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat --config zkSync.config.ts deploy-zksync --network zkSyncSepolia --script mints/mintRewardItems.ts
scripts.deployMockERC20:ZkSync:sepolia: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/deployMockERC20.testnet.ts --network zkSyncSepolia --config zkSync.config.ts
scripts.deployNftGating:ZkSync:mainnet: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat --config zkSync.config.ts deploy-zksync --network zkSync --script deployNFTGating.mainnet.ts
scripts.deployNftGating:ZkSync:goerli: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat --config zkSync.config.ts deploy-zksync --network zkSyncGoerli --script deployNFTGating.testnet.ts
scripts.deployNftGating:ZkSync:sepolia: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat --config zkSync.config.ts deploy-zksync --network zkSyncSepolia --script deployNFTGating.testnet.ts

scripts.deploySoulboundBadges:ZkSync:sepolia: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat --config zkSync.config.ts deploy-zksync --network zkSyncSepolia --script deploySoulboundBadges.testnet.ts
scripts.upgradeBadgeBound:ZkSync:mainnet: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeBadgeBound.mainnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSync
scripts.upgradeBadgeBound:ZkSync:goerli: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeBadgeBound.testnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSyncGoerli
scripts.upgradeBadgeBound:ZkSync:sepolia: pnpm compile:zkSync && hardhat run deploy/upgrades/upgradeBadgeBound.testnet.ts --config zkSync.config.ts --network zkSyncSepolia
scripts.test: REPORT_GAS=true hardhat --config hardhat.config.ts test test/hardhatTests/*.ts --network hardhat
scripts.coverage:foundry: forge coverage --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage
